goal: Go to my inbox and find the email from 'anderson.realty@realestate.pro' with the subject 'Denver Options'. Inside, there are two addresses. Look up both on Zilloft, determine which one has a lower estimated property tax for the last year, and then reply to that email stating which address is cheaper tax-wise.

evals.description: Verify a reply was sent to the original sender 'anderson.realty@realestate.pro'.
